post:
Node Specs:

> KVM: E5 2620 64GB DDR3 8x1TB in HW RAID 10 2x1GBit bonded port

> OVZ: E3 1230 V2 32GB DDR3 4x1TB in HW RAID 10 2x1Gbit bonded port

Plans

VZ

> 1024MB DEDICATED RAM 

> 512MB VSwap 

> 60GB DEDICATED DISK 

> 1TB PREMIUM BW 

> MULTIPLE LINUX OS'S 

> 1 IPV4 / 10 IPV6 $4.25 

>https://nodedeploy.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=6

KVM

> 4 Cores @ 2.0hz

> 1GB Dedicated RAM 

> 50GB RAID 10 Backed DISK 

> Unmetered Inbound / 350GB Out 

> 2x1000 mbit fully burstable 

> 1 Dedicated IPv4 Linux Only (Windows on request, if you have a valid license) $6.95/mo 

>https://nodedeploy.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=35

As usual be sure to check out our server status page <a href="http://status.nodedeploy.com">here</a> and our stock status <a href="http://status.nodedeploy.com">here</a>

Freebies -:

Inbuilt DDOS protected anycast DNS 10GB Backup space either via NFS mount or FTP/SFTP
